alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:44PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona County through 315 PM MDT... At 244 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Teapot Rock, or 31 miles north of Casper, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Teapot Rock. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 207 and 224. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton.
